Name: Label
Description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.

SubComponentData.Name: Root
SubComponentData.Description: Contains the content for the label.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: htmlFor
PropData.Description: The id of the element the label is associated with.
